text: “Paliponse pamene mungakhale imfa ikupezani ngakhale mutakhala m’malinga olimba, ndipo ngati ubwino utawafika (opembedza mafano ndi achiphamaso) amati: “Ubwinowu, ukuchokera kwa Allah.” Koma choipa chikawafikira, amati: “Ichi chachitika chifukwa cha iwe (Muhammad).” Nena: “Zonse zachokera kwa Allah.” Kodi ngotani anthu awa, sangathe kuzindikira nkhani
